name.zh: 儿童圆弧迷你双肩包（多颜色）

description.en: A cute rounded mini backpack designed for kids with a lightweight structure and comfortable straps. Features a zip closure and roomy main compartment for small essentials—ideal for daycare, short trips, and everyday use. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colors, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 儿童圆弧迷你双肩包，包型可爱轻便，背负舒适。拉链开合，主仓可放置随身小物，适合托班/幼儿园、短途出行与日常使用。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节肩带（可加软垫，定制）

en.Use Case: Daycare, kids day trips, everyday essentials
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 高 20–26cm × 宽 18–22cm × 深 8–12cm（可定制）
zh.背负方式: 双肩背负 + 顶部提手
zh.适用场景: 托班/幼儿园、儿童出游、日常随身
zh.可定制: 配色面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
